Text: UBS FX payment Cc Sarathank you for looking into this issue for us Here is a brief summary of what occured UBS and Enron entered into a SterlingUBS spot transaction on which both parties confirmed and settled on UBS pays USD and receives mio sterling On UBS and Enron erroneously confirmed the same trade again for settlement on UBS made a second USD payment to Enrons account at BADallas on payment reference FED IMA BQC UBS did not receive the Sterling it was expecting and for the next few days Enron and UBS tried to resolve the nonpayment based on a mistaken assumption that Enron owed mio Sterling to UBS On UBS realized that the trade was duped and on informed Enron of the nature of the error and requested that the USD payment be returned Enron agreed to return the USD payment on The returned payment was never received If you need additional information please contact me at or Bryan Murtagh Here are our contacts at Enron who are aware of this issue Laurel Adams operations Clara Karrington operations Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments
